introduction.title: What can you do?
introduction.description: You can search for idols in THE IDOLM@STER series and display previews of their image colors on your PC or Smartphone.

preview.title: Preview Mode
preview.description:
Displays "Image Color", "Idol Name", and "Color Code" to fill the screen.

You can instantly find out if the colors of T-shirts, tableware, stationery, etc. that you see while shopping are the colors of idols you produce on your phone! It's greatüëç

penlight.title: Penlight Mode
penlight.description:
Only "Image Color" fills the screen.

The song of your idol that suddenly starts playing at the Anime songs club event or DJ bars! But I have nothing todayüò≠

Farewell to this tragedy, your phone will be instantly transformed into a penlight! You're winnerüèÜ

howToUse.title: How To Use
howToUse.description: <0><0>Search for an idol on the search screen<1>Select the idols you want to preview<2>Tap the "Preview" or "Penlight" button
howToUse.descriptionMore:
You can also "double-tap" the idol you want to preview to activate the penlight mode as a shortcut.

Then there's the sober <0>dark theme support, and you can switch themes from the <1>brightness_4_icon / <2>brightness_7_icon the top right corner. If you'd like to use it, you're welcome to try it outüôè

imasparql.title: Where do you get idol's image colors from?
imasparql.description: <0>All the data is getting from <0>im@sparql</0>.</0><1>If you find an error in the data, please report it on <0>im@sparql's issue page</0>.</1>

frontend.title: How is the front-end implemented?
frontend.description: <0>This web app is implemented using <0>Kotlin Multiplatform. The percentage of Kotlin in the source code is over 95%.<1>In other words, this web app is almost identical to Kotori Otonashi, the clerk of 765 Productions.<2>Also, <0>Material-UI is used as a UI framework.

requests.title: Found a bug! Want them to add features!
requests.description: <0>Please report to <0>COLOR M@STER's issue page</0>!</0><1>St@r and Pull Requests are also welcome. I'll be happy to cry if you throw money at me in addition.</1><2><0>Wishlist: <0>Link</0></0></2>
